name: JAMCEPTION
description:
Welcome to The Ultimate JAMCEPTION!

A Jam game about doing jams! We are Jamie Jammerson, and this is our first jam! Do your best with design, art and programming in order to make the best game as possible!

In this game you have three different minigames to representate all your effort in the jam. Don't forget to sleep and rest! The game becames more and more harder!

This game was made for the 37th Ludum Dare,

Have fun and comment, please!

@Matlahvi-> Game Design & Art

@AlanPardo -> Game Design & Programming

Music: www.bensound.com
